fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Cashflow Supervision__
Signature Weapon
__Tulaytullah's Remembrance__
Similar to Cashflow Supervision, but reduced chances of CRIT Rate overcap.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mappa Mare__
Best craftable in **Melt** teams
__Flowing Purity__
Best craftable in other teams.
__Ballad of the Boundless Blue__
Event Weapon, should have no Energy Recharge on substats.

__Solar Pearl, Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds, Memory of Dust, Widsith__
All decent options and statsticks.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Cryo DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge (130% to Burst every rotation, 100% otherwise.)|CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery (Melt only)

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost
**2)** Elemental Skill: Icefang Rush
**3)** Elemental Burst: Darkgold Wolfbite

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Blizzard Strayer is similar to Marechaussee Hunter in Freeze teams. Both teams with his signature weapon may overcap on CRIT Rate.

__Vermillion Hereafter__
Needs 130%+ Energy Recharge
__Desert Pavillon__
Surprisingly effective, useless 2-piece effect.
 __Echos of an Offering__ 
Better on low ping.

Or mix and match 2-pieces.
